argument.description: The raw value to convert to a hexademical value.

returnType: The RAWTOHEX function returns a string value.
description: The Oracle/PLSQL RAWTOHEX function converts a raw value into a hexadecimal value. One of our viewers says that this function comes in handy to move a varchar value to a blob field.
sample:
RAWTOHEX('AB')
Result: '4142' if run as a SQL function and 'AB' if run as a PLSQL function

RAWTOHEX('7E')
Result: '3745' if run as a SQL function and '7E' as a PLSQL function
